sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: For the basic &susemgr; setup, you need to have your mirror credentials from the NCC at hand. To look up your credentials and the email address with which you are registered in NCC, proceed as follows.

procedure.title: Looking Up Mirror Credentials in NCC

step.para: Start a Web browser and go to .
From the left navigation bar, select My ProductsMirror Credentials. A Web page opens showing your credentials (username and password).
Memorize the username and the password listed there.
Select My ProfileLogin Profile and memorize the email address with which you are registered.
